Parameters: a collection of additional package names to add
setIncludedPackages(android.content.Cont.Description: Sets the list of packages considered relevant to the list of packages in the @B_android#content#Context_E@ and the list of packages provided in the input parameter additionalPackages. Either parameter can be null. Any package names stored from a previous call to this method will be cleared.

getCause(java.lang.Throwable).Description: Get the root cause of the input @B_java#lang#Throwable_E@. This method chains through each cause of the original input and returns the last cause in the chain.

getBestStackTraceElement(java.lang.Throw.Description: Return the first @B_java#lang#StackTraceElement_E@ found that has a className in any packageName found in includedPackages. If none have a className in any packageName found in includedPackages, return the first @B_java#lang#StackTraceElement_E@ found. If the @B_java#lang#Throwable_E@ does not contain any @B_java#lang#StackTraceElement_E@s, return null.

getDescription(java.lang.Throwable, java.Description: Given input of a @B_java#lang#Throwable_E@, a @B_java#lang#StackTraceElement_E@ and the name of the @B_java#lang#Thread_E@, return a @B_java#lang#String_E@ describing the @B_java#lang#Throwable_E@ and the name of the @B_java#lang#Class_E@ and method where the @B_java#lang#Throwable_E@ happened. The @B_java#lang#String_E@ returned will also have the name of the thread appended (as provided in the input parameter threadName.

Parameters: the name of the @B_java#lang#Thread_E@ that got the exception, or null
getDescription(java.lang.String, java.la.Description: Return a short description of a @B_java#lang#Throwable_E@ suitable for reporting to Google Analytics.

ClassDesc: This class will capture the root cause (last in a chain of causes) @B_java#lang#Throwable_E@ and report the exception type, class name, method name and thread name. This class will attempt to report a class and method name that is relevant to the application if at all possible. It does this by finding the root cause @B_java#lang#Throwable_E@, then checking each @B_java#lang#StackTraceElement_E@ for a class that is in a package list created by @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#StandardExceptionParser#setIncludedPackages_E@, starting with the first @B_java#lang#StackTraceElement_E@. The @B_java#lang#String_E@ returned by @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#StandardExceptionParser#getDescription_E@ will take on the form Exception class(@classname:methodname){threadname}. See @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#StandardExceptionParser#getBestStackTraceElement_E@ and @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#StandardExceptionParser#setIncludedPackages_E@ for details.
